name: Jumbled
description:
Jumbled is a turn based strategy game where you can't control what item you are holding.

In this game, you fight various enemies and go through rooms to get to the fabled treasure. But there is a twist, you're disorganized. This means whenever you have multiple items in your inventory things get jumbled. In turn every round you get a random item from your inventory. Plan out your kills and destroy all the enemies!
